CustomField.description: Returns the Name field value from the related Engagement, Opportunity or Opportunity Outcome record.
CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "IP_Engagement_Relationship" , Engagement__r.Name , IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "IP_Opportunity_Relationship" , Opportunity__r.Name , IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "IP_Opportunity_Outcome_Relationship" , Opportunity_Outcome__r.Name , "" )))
CustomField.label: Related Record Name
